name: TheBeff: The Game
description:
Click the buttons to talk to me. Make sure your sound is on!

Press 'R' at any time to restart. 

----

This solo, 3-week project was the culmination of my practice with the p5.play Javascript library for Game Studio I, a course taught by Bennett Foddy for my MFA in Game Design at New York University. 

Photos by Wendy Strauss, plus one or two by Maya Tanaka or myself. 

"Mean Game Over" sound via Robinhood76 @ freesound.org, compressed.

Questions from the New York Times "The 36 Questions That Lead to Love"
